sourcesContent:
import React from "react" import {secondsToDuration, minutesToDuration} from "../utils/duration" const FocusBreakButton = ({ focusDuration, setFocusDuration, breakDuration, setBreakDuration, session, isFocus, setIsFocus }) => { const handleIncrease = (event) => { const {name} = event.target {name == "ifocus" ? setFocusDuration((focusi)=> focusi + 5) : setBreakDuration((breaki)=> breaki + 30)} } const handleDecrease = (event) => { const {name} = event.target {name == "dfocus" ? setFocusDuration((focusd)=> (Math.max(focusd - 5,0))) : setBreakDuration((breakd)=> (Math.max(breakd - 30,0)))} } return ( <>
Focus Duration: {minutesToDuration(focusDuration)}
Break Duration: { minutesToDuration(breakDuration)}
) } export default FocusBreakButton
